title: october 16: guess who’s coming to dinner
description:
We all love a good dinner party filled with friends and family. Laughing and playful banter fill the atmosphere of the room, while good food is served for everyone to enjoy. But what happens when things don’t go as planned. In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia shares just the time when a White House dinner party did not go accordingly. Speaking of things that do not go according to plan, Maia shares the tale of a band’s split following the failure of their most recent album, Mardi Gras. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
